Package com.google.code.rees.scope.conversation

Interface Summary
ConversationArbitrator This class is used by a ConversationConfigurationProvider to determine which field and method members to associate with conversations.
ConversationConfigurationProvider This class is used by ConversationManagers to obtain the ConversationConfigurations for a given action/controller class
ConversationContextFactory Creates and returns a Map Conversation Context
ConversationManager The primary conversation processing and management component.
ConversationPostProcessor This interface allows for post-processing of a conversation.
ConversationPostProcessorWrapper A wrapper class for ConversationPostProcessor.
ConversationPostProcessorWrapperFactory Creates ConversationPostProcessorWrappers
InjectionConversationManager Implementations of this class should implement injection of ConversationFields
 

Class Summary
ConversationAdapter This class is used to adapt/integrate the major components of the conversation management to control frameworks such as Struts2 and Spring MVC or any other framework.
ConversationConfiguration This class is used to cache the fields and action IDs for a single class for a single conversation.
ConversationConstants Constants used for conversation management
ConversationEndProcessor A ConversationPostProcessor used to remove a conversation context from the session context after an action has been executed.
ConversationUtil Provides static methods intended primarily for use internally and in unit testing.
DefaultConversationArbitrator The default implementation of ConversationArbitrator
DefaultConversationConfigurationProvider The default implementation of ConversationConfigurationProvider
DefaultConversationPostProcessorWrapper The default implementation of the ConversationPostProcessorWrapper
DefaultConversationPostProcessorWrapperFactory The default implementation of the ConversationPostProcessorWrapperFactory
DefaultInjectionConversationManager The default implementation of the InjectionConversationManager
MonitoredConversationContextFactory Implements the ConversationContextFactory using MonitoredContexts for the conversation contexts
SimpleConversationManager A simple yet effective implementation of ConversationManager that manages conversation life cycles, but does not inject ConversationFields.
